most_tlds_note: You'll need an Auth/EPP code (a transfer key). Make sure the domain is unlocked before requesting the code.

registrars.name: GoDaddy
steps: Go to Additional Settings → Transfer domain away.

registrars.name: 123 Reg
steps: Find Transfer Out and request/copy the Auth Code.

registrars.name: Namecheap
steps: Click Manage next to your domain.
Scroll to Auth Code and click Get Auth Code.

registrars.name: IONOS (1&1)
steps: Click Show Authorization Code and copy the EPP code.

uk.intro: For .UK domains, use an IPS tag instead of an Auth/EPP code.
steps: Log in to your current registrar.
Find Transfer Out or Change IPS tag.
Enter the IPS tag shown below and save.
We'll accept the transfer on our side to complete.

after: You'll get a confirmation email from your current registrar — please approve it.
Do not send passwords. Only share the Auth/EPP code (or IPS tag for .uk).
Stuck? Send a screenshot on WhatsApp and we'll guide you.
